entry.title: Basic styling using bootstrap
entry.summary: In this article we some basic styling to our blog via bootstrap.

entry.title: Creating an Atom feed
entry.summary: In this article we want to create an Atom feed for our blog. An Atom feed is very handy, because users that want to follow the blog will be able to subscribe to the Atom feed and will automatically be notified whenever there is new content.

entry.title: Using cloudfront to enable https on top of s3
entry.summary: In this second article we will have a look at how to enable HTTPS on top of S3.

entry.title: Static website hosted on S3
entry.summary: Starting the blog by creating a static website hosted on S3.
